name: Arian scout
description:
Arian scout game by SLAVS MAKE GAMES

This top down puzzle (with RPG elements) is part of studets game project of SLAVS MAKE GAMES course at Udemy. After playing you can see course in instructor preview mode:

https://www.udemy.com/slavs-make-games/?instructorPreviewMode=guest

Gameplay: Story, gameplay and graphic are main path for this game project. Story is SF, peacefull and quest oriented. You play with mouse left button only and graphic is acceptable good.

Text for SLAVS MAKE GAMES students:

After learning from lectures about top down games, puzzle and quest type games you need to see implementation of intro scene, main menu and story early in a game, and quest system when game start. This part are important for your game projects. When game project is more than 30% finished contact me at letray2@yahoo.com for additional tutoring and info's how to complete you game project and graduate at SLAVS MAKE GAMES Godot 2D 3D course.
